department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: top section: numerous mounted horsemen, led by two chariots, each with a horseman and a figure under a canopy; bottom section: building at the center of a walled area with two cutaway rooms: a large room with a man addressing a group of men and a small room with two men seated with a cross-shaped game board (?) between them; other figures in courtyard; bottom section stippled on front, with graphite (?) on back, in the form of a figure and two animals-unrelated to the ink drawing
inscription:
Inscription

on back, ULC, in pencil: [1928]
title: Bhagapata Purana Illustration
